attributes.additional_details: The campaigns before the referendum were so mendacious as to erode public trust and confidence in our politicians and a new mandate is now required to take us forward, to stabilise the country, to heal the divisions and combat racism and extremism.
attributes.background: The EU Referendum has divided the ruling party and left it directionless, and the country devoid of leadership in this time of huge political, social and economic turmoil.  We ask for a general vote of no confidence to override the Fixed Term Parliament Act.
